title: Assistiv Labs
creator: Assistiv Labs
description: Instantly test how accessible your experience is with the real assistive technologies your disabled users rely on — screen readers, magnifiers, and more — from any computer.
guideline: WCAG 2.1 — W3C Web Content Accessibility Guidelines 2.1
WCAG 2.0 — W3C Web Content Accessibility Guidelines 2.0

Section 508, <abbr title="United States">US</abbr> federal procurement standard
<abbr title="Japanese Industry Standard">JIS</abbr>, Japanese industry standard
<abbr lang="fr" title="Référentiel Général d’Accessibilité pour les Administrations">RGAA</abbr>, French government standard
automated: Groups of web pages or web sites
